title: aaDum chidhambaramO
sahitya:
ADum cidambaramO ayyan kUttADum cidambaramO 

(ADum)



anupallavi



Adum cidambaram anbar kaLikkavE nAdum cidambaram

namashivAyavenru 

(ADum)



caraNam 1



yArum ariyAmal ambala vANanAr shIraDiyAr pArkka sEvaDi tUkki

ninru 

(Adum)



caraNam 2



bAlakrSnan pOTrum panimadi shaDaiyinAr tALa maddaLam

pODa tAttattai enavE 

(ADum)
